title: Rock Creek Park: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar       The August Schedule of Events.           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 18 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Rock Creek Park Exploring the Universe      Time: 4:00 PM Location: Nature Center Fees: Free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Visit distant galaxies, nebulas, and other deep space objects and discover the wide world of astronomy without ever leaving your planetarium seat! Ages 7 to adult. View Details      Rock Creek Park Gotta Catch 'Em All!      Time: 10:00 AM Location: Rock Creek Park Nature Center Fees: Free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Learn about the low tech origin of Pokemon Go and all the great ways to 'catch' and collect your National Parks!  View Details      Rock Creek Park Summer Night Sky      Time: 1:00 PM Location: Planetarium Fees: Free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 View the season's brightest stars, planets, and constellations in the only planetarium in the U.S. National Park System. View Details      Rock Creek Park Perspectives of the Old Stone House      Time: 2:30 PM Location: Old Stone House Fees: Free     Wednesday, August 17, 2016 Rangers will present highlights on middle-class life in Georgetown, the evolution of a neighborhood and the changing uses of an urban garden. View Details      Rock Creek Park Young Planetarium      Time: 4:00 PM Location: Nature Center Fees: Free     Wednesday, August 17, 2016 Calling all kids! Learn about the twinkling stars and wandering planets during this introductory astronomy program. View Details      Rock Creek Park Nature's Classroom: STEM Time for Toddlers      Time: 4:00 PM Location: Nature Center Fees: Free     Thursday, August 18, 2016 There will be activities designed for our youngest visitors, 1-4 years old. Activities may focus on science, technology, engineering and/or math. View Details      Rock Creek Park Carter Barron - Rock the City      Time: 7:00 PM to 10:00 PM Location: Carter Barron Amphitheatre Fees: Tickets required     Saturday, August 20, 2016 Salsa and Merengue Band, Dave Bass, Lahla Hadiay. http://musicatthemonument.com/ View Details      Rock Creek Park Centennial Hike      Time: 11:00 AM Location: Nature Center Fees: Free     Saturday, August 20, 2016 A two mile hike that looks at the history of the National Park Service through the lens of Rock Creek Park.
